title: Central stays in Paris
text: I've stayed in Citadines three times with friends and family and always find it very conveniently located just above Les Halles, with easy RER airport connections and great shopping and dining, though it can get noisy at weekends above the square. Love walking to the Marais and museums nearby. Accommodations are clean and well provided on needed household items. Staff are efficient and friendly and the free lobby coffee, a recent touch, is excellent!
